body_html:
Hi @meteorcloudy,

It is probably possible to provide this option (--define=grpc_no_ares=true) in the command line for bazel build of tensorflow?
That would be at least temporary solution.
Thanks in advance for the response.

Regards.

body:
Hi @meteorcloudy,

It is probably possible to provide this option (--define=grpc_no_ares=true) in the command line for bazel build of tensorflow?
That would be at least temporary solution.
Thanks in advance for the response.

Regards.
